pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'leaflet' Extensions for 'mapview' // Provides extensions for packages 'leaflet' 'mapdeck', many of which are used by package 'mapview'. Focus is on functionality readily available in Geographic Information Systems such as 'Quantum GIS'. Includes functions to display coordinates of mouse pointer position, query image values via mouse pointer and zoom-to- layer buttons. Additionally, provides a feature type agnostic function to add points, lines, polygons to a map.
